messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Kids chat tonight?/Kris
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Oh great!  Lanora has been talking a LOT about how she wants to talk and visit with Elizabeth.  In fact, we were talking about how much we both like your
messages.messageBody:
Hi

Oh great! Lanora has been talking a LOT about how she wants to talk and
visit with Elizabeth. In fact, we were talking about how much we both like
your whole family, Lanora's words "Just really nice people". She meant all
of you, I agreed.

Lanora's email is kimono@... and her AIM screen name is
"xDarkPurity" (whatever that means, LOL). She will probably be going online
to chat tonight at about 7:30pm. I think Sandra Dodd's daughter, Holly,
will be coming on too, I think the three of them would really enjoy each
other. Other than that, Lanora is on most nights until the wee hours, she
uses several different chatting programs and she can fill Elizabeth in on
those if she uses them too. She'll be on AIM for sure tonight tho.

Hope you all are doing well, looking forward to seeing you at the party.
BTW, what can I bring?

Kris

-----Original Message-----
From: KimandWeldon@... [mailto:KimandWeldon@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 08, 2003 3:25 PM
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Kids chat tonight?/Kris

Hiya Kris..
Hey, Elizabeth would like to have Lanora's email addy, as she would like
to
send her mail....Also, Elizabeth is up late nights, she would love to 'chat'
with Lanora...
Thanks!
-Kim :o)
